name: Lisa
line: I said stop! Enough! You've ruined my clothes, my phone.

name: Lisa
line: How shall I pay rent and feed you, if you spent all MY money on your wish?!

name: Lisa
line: It's not even YOUR wish if you want to change ME!!!

name: Marcus
line: Lisa, calm down, you scare me.

name: Lisa
line: How shall I pay rent and feed you, if you spent all MY money on your wish?!

name: Lisa
line: I tried hard to join your ideas and share your interests. And what I got?!

name: Lisa
line: Ignorance and problems! Do you care about me?

name: Lisa
line: Do you even know, who am I in my life?!!!
